_sText:
Gg_snowy_sanctum_verone
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
version 1.0 for CS:S
by Dubesinhower
release date: 12/19/08
map type: gungame

features
~~~~~~~~
no weapon spawns
up to 32 player spawns
symetrical awesomeness
couple of sniping spots
snow
big ass fire

copyright 2008 dubesinhower
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
if you want to edit or make corrections to any part of this map,
please contact me first at dubesinhower@gmail.com



yea, so i made another map, similar to my first one, gg_sewer_simple_verone, in the same respect that it's a small, symmetrical map that is quick and easy to learn. it is perfect for gungame ownage.

the massive fire in the middle prevents each side from knowing exactly where the other is going, but it isn't obstructive enough to stop game play (unless you walk in to it). so go ahead and rip it up!
